entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
